forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: allow scale all parts on one axis

comments.text: it would be very handy if we could scale all parts but only in one direction, allowing us to flatten/fatten, or heighten/shorten the whole creation.
not sure how hard that would be to implement, but it would certainly make life easier when editing things.
definitely! we spent a whole day on that task and had something *almost* working, but it was also very broken on a few shapes, so we need to look into that again in the future...

thread.latestCommentText: definitely! we spent a whole day on that task and had something *almost* working, but it was also very broken on a few shapes, so we need to look into that again in the future...
